defaultCards.name: Moore Carleton
defaultCards.facts: Moore got his BS in EECS from the University of Colorado. He helps run the Collaborative Software Development Laboratory.

defaultCards.name: Johnson Philip
defaultCards.facts: Moore got his BS in CS from the University of Michigan (along with a BS in Biology!). He co-founded the Geo Garden Club, an app that connects local gardeners.

defaultCards.name: Kim Binsted
defaultCards.facts: I am a Professor of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii, Director of the Collaborative Software Development Laboratory, and the CEO of OpenPowerQuality.com.
